alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 5:12AM AKDT until March 14 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Total snowfall accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Juneau Borough. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snowfall rates will take place in the morning with only minor accumulations in the afternoon. Snow will begin to mix with rain in the afternoon. As of 4 AM, around 1 inch of snowfall had fallen across Juneau.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
